name: Lights Out (itch) (vickenobii)
description:
CONTROLS: Arrow Keys to move. C or Arrow Up to jump and interact with megaphones. X to dash (very important).

You can also use a controller, if you want.

------------------------------------------------

"The Sun... Something is wrong with the Sun... Is it coming this way?!"

Lights Out is my new platformer game made with the beautiful pocket platformer by the_l0bster (thanks for making it that easy to make a game!)

This platformer game with minimalist graphic design was created to exploit the dash mechanic, and to tell a story about... I can't tell much because it would be a huge spoiler so, why don't you discover the story on your own?

In this game you will find:

  • Challenging levels designed for speedrunning
  • A satisfying dash mechanic (thanks again to the_l0bster for that)
  • Short but engaging story
  • A random weirdo
  • Lots of replayability
  • But mostly important: FUN

Additional thanks to PixelPoldi for the spike sprite with which I had so much trouble and my brother blokete (Twitch) for the beautiful cover image.

Music: A Lonely Strain, by Apocryphos, Kammarheit, Atrium Carceri.
